content: Is there info for track leads somewhere, or was there a message I missed?
Hello @Gino Canessa . Yes, Sandy should have emailed you your info, and there is of course confluence as well. Let me know if I can help find what you need.
Looks like there was a page edit that removed me as a track lead. Josh just forwarded me the email with the zoom info, is there anything else I need to know?
maybe.. what are you the track lead of? did you get your zoom info yet?
Argonaut Granular Controls - yes, Josh forwarded the zoom info
I didn't get a zoom or track participant email yet either, though I got the email from early today stating we would :)
I do have the whova info
@Bryn Evans can you help @Jenni Syed
@Sandra Vance can you please send @Jenni Syed her participant list?
@Jenni Syed Hi, you're jenni.syed@cerner.com?
Correct @Bryn Evans
@Jenni Syed I'm emailing you the Zoom info now.
Thanks @Bryn Evans , received the email with the zoom info.
@Sandra Vance @Bryn Evans I still don't have the email with the Zoom info and list of participants.
@Sandra Vance @Bryn Evans the FHIR Shorthand track lead, @Mint Thompson , says they have not received it either.
@Peter Jordan - I think you're supposed to go in via Whova...
Track leads need to sign in via Zoom to actually run the meeting. Whova is for participant logins.

@Sandra Vance @Bryn Evans I know you are busy pulling this all together. Thank you. I will also need the zoom information and list of participants for Patient Track. I'll be covering for @Ron Shapiro . Neither of us have received the information yet. Thanks.

Mike Ross said:

Sandra Vance Bryn Evans I know you are busy pulling this all together. Thank you. I will also need the zoom information and list of participants for Patient Track. I'll be covering for Ron Shapiro . Neither of us have received the information yet. Thanks.

Sandra Vance Bryn Evans I know you are busy pulling this all together. Thank you. I will also need the zoom information and list of participants for Patient Track. I'll be covering for Ron Shapiro . Neither of us have received the information yet. Thanks.
@Sandra Vance Hi Sandy, can you please provide the zoom info for the Death Reporting: CMS to EDRS workflow?

Cindy Bush said:

Sandra Vance Hi Sandy, can you please provide the zoom info for the Death Reporting: CMS to EDRS workflow?
`` resent the email so its at the top of your inbox. ;-)
How come only a few participants show up in the breakout list? How can all participants show up in the breakout rooms list?
@Sandra Vance and all - looks like zulip just choked for many. A lot of "unable to connect" and "internal server error" (mine took several restarts to connect well)

@Sandra Vance - Can you change the Whova Track Highlights for the HRex/CDex/PCDE track details info to @Lloyd McKenzie as the presenter? He'll be giving the report-out at 3p ET on behalf of the entire track. Thanks!
@May Terry I just updated this to show @Lloyd McKenzie as the presenter

May Terry said:

Sandra Vance - Can you change the Whova Track Highlights for the HRex/CDex/PCDE track details info to Lloyd McKenzie as the presenter? He'll be giving the report-out at 3p ET on behalf of the entire track. Thanks!

Done.
@Sandra Vance is there an all-hands summary session at 4pm ET today? I can't find it on the agenda and several others have asked about this.
